events.blurb: The Ministry of Magic established.
events.description:
The Ministry of Magic established. It seems clear that the
Wizarding world was already in hiding.  It is also notable
that the Wizengamot predates the Ministry, as the first Minister
was "Previously head of the Wizengamot."
events.source:
* Mrs. J. K. Rowling.
  "[Ministers of Magic](https://www.rowlingindex.org/work/msmpm/)"
  _[The J.K. Rowling Index](https://www.rowlingindex.org/)_
  Originally Published: 2014-10-31. Last Visited: 2023-12-05.

events.blurb: Damocles Rowle elected Minister of Magic
events.description: From his two sentence description, he was a bigot who was eventually forced to step down.  The exact role of the International Confederation of Wizards in this is unclear.
events.source:
* Mrs. J. K. Rowling.
  "[Ministers of Magic](https://www.rowlingindex.org/work/msmpm/)"
  _[The J.K. Rowling Index](https://www.rowlingindex.org/)_
  Originally Published: 2014-10-31. Last Visited: 2023-12-05.

events.blurb: Hector Fawley elected Minister of Magic
events.description:
Voted out of office because he failed to take [Gellert Grindelwald]
seriously. 

[Gellert Grindelwald]: <../people/grindelwald/gellert/>

events.blurb: Nobby Leach elected Minister of Magic
events.description:
[Leach] is listed as being a first-generation magical.  The source blurb
states that many pure-bloods resigned in protest over his appointment,
and that he left office after contracting a "mysterious illness" about which there are a number of conspiracy theories.

[Leach]: <../people/leach/nobby/>
events.source:
* Mrs. J. K. Rowling.
  "[Ministers of Magic](https://www.rowlingindex.org/work/msmpm/)"
  _[The J.K. Rowling Index](https://www.rowlingindex.org/)_
  Originally Published: 2014-10-31. Last Visited: 2023-12-05.

events.blurb: Eugenia Jenkins elected Minister of Magic
events.description:
Despite dealing competently with the pure-blood riots in the late 60s, the public perception was that he was unequal to the task of dealing with
[Riddle].  This ultimately cost him his position. 

[Riddle]: <../people/riddle/tom_marvolo/>
events.source:
* Mrs. J. K. Rowling.
  "[Ministers of Magic](https://www.rowlingindex.org/work/msmpm/)"
  _[The J.K. Rowling Index](https://www.rowlingindex.org/)_
  Originally Published: 2014-10-31. Last Visited: 2023-12-05.

events.blurb: Harold Minchum elected Minister of Magic
events.description:
Elected to deal with the [Riddle] problem, he responded by placing more [Dementors] around [Azkaban].  This proved ineffective. 

[Riddle]: <../people/riddle/tom_marvolo/>

[Dementors]: <../non-beings/dementor/>

[Azkaban]: <../azkaban/>
events.source:
* Mrs. J. K. Rowling.
  "[Ministers of Magic](https://www.rowlingindex.org/work/msmpm/)"
  _[The J.K. Rowling Index](https://www.rowlingindex.org/)_
  Originally Published: 2014-10-31. Last Visited: 2023-12-05.

events.blurb: Millicent Bagnold elected Minister of Magic
events.description:
The third Minister to face the [Riddle] war, she also had to answer to the [International Confederation of Wizards] over breaches to the [International Statute of Secrecy] as the Wizarding world celebrated [Riddle]'s disappearance. 

[Riddle]: <../people/riddle/tom_marvolo/>

[International Confederation of Wizards]: <../culture/government/>

[International Statute of Secrecy]: <../culture/>
